newsitem.title: USA: Chris-Craft Q4 diluted shr loss $0.03.
newsitem.headline: Chris-Craft Q4 diluted shr loss $0.03.

text.p: FOURTH QUARTERS AND YEARS ENDED DECEMBER 31, 1996 AND 1995
(a) After approximately $3.7 million of one-time expenses associated with the start-up of a national sales representative subsidiary at United Television, Inc.

(b) Reflects 100% of UPN losses consistent with sole ownership of the network during these periods by BHC Communications, Inc., Chris-Craft's television broadcasting subsidiary. After year-end, Viacom Inc. completed its acquisition of a 50% interest in the network, and BHC and Viacom now share equally in UPN losses. Such UPN results will continue to be accounted for under the equity method.
(c) After state income tax reversal of $20 million by BHC in the third quarter of 1995.

(d) Reflects the interest of stockholders other than Chris-Craft in the operating results of BHC, 76% owned at December 31, 1996, and the interest of stockholders other than BHC in the operating results of UTV, 59% owned by BHC at December 31, 1996.
(e) Before preferred stock dividend requirements of $107 and $115 in the fourth quarters, and $436 and $464 in 1996 and 1995, respectively.
(f) After giving effect to the 3% stock dividend declared January 1997.
